languages.text: "Отрицание вины лишь усиливает подозрения, губернатор. Теперь по порядку: десятина украдена с вашего мира. За это вы несете ответственность, даже если не причастны к похищению. Далее: ресурсы вы предоставите без возражений, поскольку я использую их, чтобы вернуть контроль над миром. Подчинитесь, или я посчитаю, что вы препятствуете расследованию — и приму меры".

"Denying guilt only adds to the suspicions against you, Governor. Now, let us go over everything one more time. The tithe was stolen from your world. You are culpable for this incident whether you were personally involved or not. You will provide the resources I have requested without objection, as this measure serves to re-establish control over the planet. Comply, or I will consider your refusal an obstruction of the investigation and take steps accordingly."
languages.original_text: "Отрицание вины лишь усиливает подозрения, губернатор. Теперь по порядку: десятина украдена с вашего мира. За это вы несете ответственность, даже если не причастны к похищению. Далее: ресурсы вы предоставите без возражений, поскольку я использую их, чтобы вернуть контроль над миром. Подчинитесь, или я посчитаю, что вы препятствуете расследованию — и приму меры".

Comply, or I will consider your refusal an obstruction of the investigation and take steps accordingly."

languages.text: "Die Leugnung Eurer Schuld erhärtet den Verdacht gegen Euch, Gouverneur. Und jetzt lasst uns alles noch einmal durchgehen. Der Zehnt wurde auf Eurer Welt gestohlen. Ihr tragt dafür die Verantwortung, egal, ob Ihr persönlich beteiligt wart, oder nicht. Ihr werdet die von mir geforderten Ressourcen anstandslos bereitstellen, da diese Maßnahme der Wiederherstellung der Kontrolle über den Planeten dient. Fügt Euch oder ich werde Eure Weigerung als Behinderung der Untersuchungen deuten und entsprechende Schritte ergreifen."
languages.original_text: "Denying guilt only adds to the suspicions against you, Governor. Now, let us go over everything one more time. The tithe was stolen from your world. You are culpable for this incident whether you were personally involved or not. You will provide the resources I have requested without objection, as this measure serves to re-establish control over the planet. Comply, or I will consider your refusal an obstruction of the investigation and take steps accordingly."

traits.locale_text: "Die Leugnung Eurer Schuld erhärtet den Verdacht gegen Euch, Gouverneur. Und jetzt lasst uns alles noch einmal durchgehen. Der Zent wurde auf Eurer Welt gestohlen. Ihr tragt dafür die Verantwortung, egal, ob Ihr persönlich beteiligt wart, oder nicht. Ihr werdet die von mir geforderten Ressourcen anstandslos bereitstellen, da diese Maßnahme der Wiederherstellung der Kontrolle über den Planeten dient. Fügt Euch oder ich werde Eure Weigerung als Behinderung der Untersuchungen deuten und entsprechende Schritte ergreifen."

languages.text: « Nier votre culpabilité ne fait qu'alourdir les soupçons à votre encontre, Gouverneur. Dois-je vous rappeler les faits une fois de plus ? La dîme a été volée sur votre monde. Que vous soyez personnellement impliqué ou non, vous n'en demeurez pas moins coupable de cet incident. Vous allez me fournir les ressources que je vous demande sans objection, car cette mesure servira à reprendre le contrôle de la planète. Obéissez, ou je considérerai votre refus comme une tentative d'entraver l'enquête... ce qui m'obligerait à prendre les mesures qui s'imposent. »
languages.original_text: "Denying guilt only adds to the suspicions against you, Governor. Now, let us go over everything one more time. The tithe was stolen from your world. You are culpable for this incident whether you were personally involved or not. You will provide the resources I have requested without objection, as this measure serves to re-establish control over the planet. Comply, or I will consider your refusal an obstruction of the investigation and take steps accordingly."

traits.locale_text: « Nier votre culpabilité ne fait qu'alourdir les soupçons à votre encontre, Gouverneur. Dois-je vous rappeler les faits une fois de plus ? La dîme a été volée sur votre monde. Que vous soyez personnellement impliqué ou non, vous n'en demeurez pas moins coupable de cet incident. Vous allez me fournir les ressources que je vous demande sans objection, car cette mesure servira à reprendre le contrôle de la planète. Obéissez, ou je considérerai votre refus comme une tentative d'entraver l'enquête... ce qui m'obligerait à prendre les mesures qui s'imposent. »

languages.text: «Negar su culpabilidad no hace más que aumentar las sospechas sobre su persona, gobernador. Repasemos la situación una vez más. El diezmo de su mundo ha sido robado. Es usted culpable de este incidente, tanto si se ha visto implicado personalmente como si no. Me proporcionará los recursos que he solicitado sin poner ninguna traba a fin de recuperar el control del planeta. Obedezca, o interpretaré su negativa como una obstrucción de mi investigación y tomaré las medidas pertinentes».
languages.original_text: "Denying guilt only adds to the suspicions against you, Governor. Now, let us go over everything one more time. The tithe was stolen from your world. You are culpable for this incident whether you were personally involved or not. You will provide the resources I have requested without objection, as this measure serves to re-establish control over the planet. Comply, or I will consider your refusal an obstruction of the investigation and take steps accordingly."

traits.locale_text: «Negar su culpabilidad no hace más que aumentar las sospechas sobre su persona, gobernador. Repasemos la situación una vez más. El diezmo de su mundo ha sido robado. Es usted culpable de este incidente, tanto si se ha visto implicado personalmente como si no. Me proporcionará los recursos que he solicitado sin poner ninguna traba a fin de recuperar el control del planeta. Obedezca, o interpretaré su negativa como una obstrucción de mi investigación y tomaré las medidas pertinentes».

languages.text: “坚称自己无罪，只会进一步激起法务部对你的怀疑，总督。之前发生的事情，我再和你过一遍。帝国什一税是在你的世界失窃的，因此无论你是否亲自参与了这场盗窃，你都要对这件事情负责。你必须提供我要求的资源，不得有任何异议，因为我的要求有助于夺回这颗行星的控制。按照我的要求来做，否则我会将你的拒绝视为妨碍调查，采取相应措施。”
languages.original_text: "Denying guilt only adds to the suspicions against you, Governor. Now, let us go over everything one more time. The tithe was stolen from your world. You are culpable for this incident whether you were personally involved or not. You will provide the resources I have requested without objection, as this measure serves to re-establish control over the planet. Comply, or I will consider your refusal an obstruction of the investigation and take steps accordingly."

traits.locale_text: “坚称自己无罪，只会进一步激起法务部对你的怀疑，总督。之前发生的事情，我再和你过一遍。帝国什一税是在你的世界失窃的，因此无论你是否亲自参与了这场盗窃，你都要对这件事情负责。你必须提供我要求的资源，不得有任何异议，因为我的要求有助于夺回这颗行星的控制。按照我的要求来做，否则我会将你的拒绝视为妨碍调查，采取相应措施。”

languages.text: 「罪を否認すればするほど、疑いはますます深まるだけですよ、総督。では、もう一度すべてを整理しておきましょう。あなたの惑星から租税が盗まれた。あなたが直接関与していようといまいと、この事件の責任はあなたに問われます。これは惑星の統治を再建するための措置です。したがって、あなたには私の求めた資源を無条件で提供してもらいます。従わない場合、捜査への妨害と判断し、然るべき措置を講じます」
languages.original_text: "Denying guilt only adds to the suspicions against you, Governor. Now, let us go over everything one more time. The tithe was stolen from your world. You are culpable for this incident whether you were personally involved or not. You will provide the resources I have requested without objection, as this measure serves to re-establish control over the planet. Comply, or I will consider your refusal an obstruction of the investigation and take steps accordingly."

traits.locale_text: 「罪を否認すればするほど、疑いはますます深まるだけですよ、総督。では、もう一度すべてを整理しておきましょう。あなたの惑星から租税が盗まれた。あなたが直接関与していようといまいと、この事件の責任はあなたに問われます。これは惑星の統治を再建するための措置です。したがって、あなたには私の求めた資源を無条件で提供してもらいます。従わない場合、捜査への妨害と判断し、然るべき措置を講じます」

languages.text: "Suçunuzu inkâr ederek size karşı olan şüpheleri güçlendiriyorsunuz Vali Bey. Olan biten her şeyin üzerinden bir kez daha geçelim. Aşar sizin dünyanızdan çalındı. Bu olaya şahsen dâhil olup olmamanız, kabahatinizin büyüklüğünü değiştirmez. Gezegendeki hâkimiyetin yeniden tesisi için hiçbir itirazda bulunmadan talep ettiğim kaynakları sağlayacaksınız. Emirlerime itaat etmediğiniz takdirde kararınızı soruşturmaya engel olma teşebbüsü olarak değerlendirecek ve bu doğrultuda hareket etmek zorunda kalacağım."
languages.original_text: "Denying guilt only adds to the suspicions against you, Governor. Now, let us go over everything one more time. The tithe was stolen from your world. You are culpable for this incident whether you were personally involved or not. You will provide the resources I have requested without objection, as this measure serves to re-establish control over the planet. Comply, or I will consider your refusal an obstruction of the investigation and take steps accordingly."

Bu olaya şahsen dâhil olup olmamanız, kabahatinizin büyüklüğünü değiştirmez. Gezegendeki hâkimiyetin yeniden tesisi için hiçbir itirazda bulunmadan talep ettiğim kaynakları sağlayacaksınız. Emirlerime itaat etmediğiniz takdirde kararınızı soruşturmaya engel olma teşebbüsü olarak değerlendirecek ve bu doğrultuda hareket etmek zorunda kalacağım."
